title: Air Products and Chemicals ' sales 2009 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 9674.0 was reached at Year 2011
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 7504.0 was reported at Year 2016
